concept.title: WebHelp Responsive Output Overview
concept.shortdesc: The WebHelp Responsive features a very flexible layout, is designed to adapt to any screen size, and is available for DITA document types.

conbody.draft-comment: This topic is intended to describe the main features for the WH Responsive output from the user perspective.
conbody.p: The WebHelp Responsive with Feedback variant also includes a feedback system that allows your users to make comments and allows you to manage and reply to them.

p.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

conbody.p: WebHelp Responsive output can be generated by using the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive or DITA Map WebHelp Responsive with Feedback transformation scenario.
